mapper.select: select t.COMPANY_ID CompanyId,t.NAME,t.CODE,t.REMARK,t.REPRESENTATIVE ,isnull(a.ACCOUNT_BALANCE,0) AccountBalance,isnull(a.ACCOUNT_ID,0) AccountId from HR_COMPANY t LEFT JOIN HR_CO_ACCOUNT a on a.COMPANY_ID=t.COMPANY_ID where t.NAME like '%${value}%'

select t.COMPANY_ID CompanyId,t.NAME,t.CODE,t.REMARK,t.REPRESENTATIVE ,isnull(a.ACCOUNT_BALANCE,0) AccountBalance,isnull(a.ACCOUNT_ID,0) AccountId from HR_COMPANY t LEFT JOIN HR_CO_ACCOUNT a on a.COMPANY_ID=t.COMPANY_ID where t.COMPANY_ID=#{value}

SELECT t.POSITION_ID PositionId,POSITION_NAME PositionName, POSITION_DESC PositionDesc,BASE_SALARY BaseSalary,ASSIST_SALARY AssistSalary,CONSOLATION_FEE ConsolationFee, INSURANCE Insurance,ACCUMULATION_FUND AccumulationFund ,s.PLAN_COUNT PlanCount FROM [HR_POSITION] t inner JOIN HR_CO_SETTING s on s.POSITION_ID=t.POSITION_ID where s.COMPANY_ID=#{value} order by t.POSITION_ID
mapper.delete: delete from [HR_CO_SETTING] where COMPANY_ID=#{CompanyId} and POSITION_ID=#{PositionId}
